msg.msgText: The action {0} for Object: {1} is not allowed on a standby node.

msgExplanation.p: The requested action cannot be completed because the system is part of an HA pair and the current node has not been designated as the primary node.

msgUserResponse.p: Wait until Message Gateway is fully initialized and reinitiate the call if node is supposed to act as the primary node. Contact IBM support if problem persists.
